LabelResult edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.WatershedSegmenter.label ( LatLonGrid  data  )  [virtual]

Creates a labeled grid where background pixels are set to 0 and labels for objects go 1,2,3.

.. All pixels > thresh are part of an object.

00255                                                             {
00256         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("wshed");
00257         
00258         // data
00259         LatLonGrid grid = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling()).crop(1000, 2100, 100, 200);
00260         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00261         
00262         // int min_thresh = 0; int max_thresh = 400; int incr_thresh = 200; // log scaling
00263         int min_thresh = 0; int max_thresh = 20; int incr_thresh = 10; // linear scaling
00264         
00265         for (int thresh=min_thresh; thresh <= max_thresh; thresh += incr_thresh){
00266             WatershedSegmenter seg = new WatershedSegmenter(thresh);
00267             LatLonGrid label = seg.label(grid).label;
00268             KmlWriter.write(label, out, "wsheds_"+thresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00269         }
00270         
00271         grid = new ConvolutionFilter(ConvolutionFilter.gauss(9, 9)).smooth(grid);
00272         for (int thresh=min_thresh; thresh <= max_thresh; thresh += incr_thresh){
00273             WatershedSegmenter seg = new WatershedSegmenter(thresh);
00274             LatLonGrid label = seg.label(grid).label;
00275             KmlWriter.write(label, out, "urbanareas_"+thresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00276         }
